name: Cat Sorter VR
description: Live, laugh, and sort some cats. This adorafying party game supports Oculus and Vive room-scale!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.8ghz i5 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 980ti or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Room-scale min space of 2.5 - 3 meters
